english.segment1: would you have noticed if i swam away. did i make you think twice about letting me in. maybe if you'd hold me one more time. one more time. i can't tell you anything that is not a lie
english.segment2: the changing times. the fading lines. will you carry me. a fortress falls. a lady calls. will you marry me
english.segment3: shot down your advice about the world. but i didn't listen when you hated me. it took me ages just to come to this. if you wanted to kill me. you could've done it with a kiss. with a kiss
english.segment4: the changing times. the fading lines. will you carry me. a fortress falls. a lady calls. will you marry me
english.segment5: since you went sour. i've been wondering how the rest will fall to place. but i didn't notice. how you undertook this burden of disgrace
english.segment6: the changing times. the fading lines. will you carry me. a fortress falls. a lady calls. will you marry me
english.segment7: the changing times. the fading lines. will you carry me. a fortress falls. a lady calls. will you marry me. marry me. marry me. merry me
